RNS Number : 5291NLegal & General Group Plc30 September 2021

Legal & general group plc

30 September 2021

Notification of new directorship

Legal & General Group Plc announces, in compliance with its obligations under Listing Rule 9.6.14(2), that Lesley Knox will join the Board of 3i Group plc as a Non-Executive Director with effect from 1 October 2021.

ENDS

Leanne Cornish

Senior Assistant Company Secretary

Legal & General Group Plc

Tel: 0203 124 2107
